Html:
Hi All,

Can any one tell me how to Add / Restrict the Modules OnDemand ? In Prism 4 Framework.

Thanks and Regards,

Sakthi

Hi Sakthi,

Based on my understanding, I believe you could find the following blog post useful:

  • Authentication and role based authorization in Prism v4

In the aforementioned blog post you can find a sample application that simulates a login scenario where the modules are loaded on demand according to the role of the user. In order to do this, the application defines a shared service (the IAuthorizationService) to obtain a list of modules depending of a parameter (the role of the user) and then, load the modules specified in this list through the Prism's ModuleManager. I believe that this approach might be similar to the functionality you want to achieve.

I hope you find this useful,

Damian Cherubini
